Title: Requires menstrual products to be provided in drop-in centers, intake shelters and emergency congregate housing
Summary: Requires menstrual products to be provided in drop-in centers, intake shelters and emergency congregate housing.
LawCode: Amd ยง152-c, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing menstrual products at drop-in centers, intake shelters, and emergency congregate housing
